articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Long COVID has affected nearly 7% of American adults, CDC survey data finds - CBS News
articles.description: The survey suggests nearly 18 million American adults have suffered from long COVID at some point since the pandemic began — and children can be affected too.
articles.content: Millions of Americans report having long COVID, either previously or at the time of being surveyed, according to new data from the the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's National Center for… [+3592 chars]
